column5: Stunning elegant lake front house nestled in more than an acre of trees. Top quality amenities include granite counters and top of the line appliances. Relax in the salt water pool & hot tub while the sun sets over the lake. Bring along your boat, wave runner & fishing poles, too ... you'll have your own private dock!  Austin nightlife is a little over 20 miles away.   A 1 bedroom guest house is available as an option for an additional $395/night if you'd like to invite more family or friends!!
column8: Lake Travis Lake Front Tree House
